section.heading: Transition of professional counselors.
section.text: For a period of 2 years following July 22, 1992, all reference to a professional counselor shall be deemed to refer to a person meeting the requirements for licensure in the District, regardless of whether that person is licensed.

annotations.annotation: as added July 22, 1992, D.C. Law 9-126, § 2(g), 39 DCR 3824
